entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a teacher who instructs Harry in Occlumency lessons. He is described as someone who Harry has strong feelings of resentment towards.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned alongside Snape as someone Harry has strong feelings of resentment towards.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who is sleeping next to Harry and whose snores are eventually replaced by deep breathing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is trying to empty his mind before sleep but finds it difficult due to his feelings towards Snape and Umbridge.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as someone who is waltzing with Professor Sprout in Harry's dream.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is mentioned as someone who is waltzing with Neville in Harry's dream.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as playing the bagpipes in Harry's dream.

entities.name: d.a.
entities.description: The D.A. is a group of students that Harry wants to find in his dream.

entities.name: room of requirement
entities.description: The Room of Requirement is the location where Neville and Professor Sprout are waltzing in Harry's dream.

relationships.description: Harry has strong feelings of resentment towards Snape, which makes it difficult for him to empty his mind before sleep.
Harry also has strong feelings of resentment towards Umbridge, which contributes to his difficulty in falling asleep.
Neville and Professor Sprout are waltzing together in Harry's dream.
